name: URI parser for PreloadJS/SoundJS
description: This pattern matches filenames:* Optional domain with any protocol* Optional filename after domain, or relative files using /, ./, or ../, etc.* Forces a filename.extension* Optional query string* Supports double-byte characters* Capture groups for protocol, domain, path, filename, extension, and query.Used in PreloadJS 0.3.1 and SoundJS 0.4.1
author: gskinner.com
